snippet.title: GameCube Longplay [009] Super Smash Bros. Melee
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by Tsunao

Fighting game by HAL Laboratory.

[insert dribble about non-existant plot]

Expands on the original formula by including wall leaps, more grab directions, different gameplay modees, more characters.  When it comes down to it, it is the same as the first:  pummel your opponent senseless and hit 'em hard to make them go flying.

This longplay goes through Classic with Captain Falcon, Adventure with Mario, and All-Star Mode with Ganondorf on Normal difficulty with mediocre skills.  I continued in Adventure and All-Star. =/  Adventure was worth it since I got to fight Giga Bowser. :3  I also tackle all 51 Events in Event Mode.  Some failures were cut out.  Shame, because I had some sweet finishes on some opponents.  I mostly use Captain Falcon (dat knee, man!) and Ganondorf (CLONE!).  At the end, I show the little special video in the Archive thingy.  Don't mind me dashing left and right rapidly.  I blame my friend for doing it...A LOT! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
